body.name: OGHom Handheld Steamer for Clothes, Portable Travel Fabric Wrinkle Remover, 30 Second Fast Heat Up, 300ml Large Capacity for 20 Minutes of Continuous Steaming
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 13 hrs 6 mins
features: Large Water Tank: The steamer is upgraded to a 300ml large capacity water tank allows for sustained release of powerful steam for up to 20 minutes, significantly extending the usage time. Say goodbye to frequent refills and easily remove wrinkles from clothes quickly and efficiently.

Upgraded Technology: This garment steamer is equipped with pump steam technology, ensuring no leaks or spills during both vertical and horizontal steaming. This enhances safety and convenience during operation.

Fast Heating: Utilizing advanced heating technology, this steamer heats up within 30 seconds, reducing preparation time and allowing you to start steaming your clothes immediately. Experience enhanced efficiency.

Portable and Lightweight: Designed to be compact and lightweight, this handheld steamer can easily fit into any carry-on or personal luggage. It comes with a 9-foot power cord, allowing for convenient use even at a distance.

Versatile Use: Suitable for all fabrics, this steamer can be used for a wide range of items such as t-shirts, shirts, jackets, wool, denim, curtains, toys, silk, and more, enhancing your lifestyle. Please note that the steamer is only compatible with 120V voltage. Using any type of adapter/plug converter will damage the product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars nice and effective
reviews.reviewText: This Electrolux steamer is so easy to use and it works great. I did a lot of research before choosing this one and I'm glad I did. This steamer gets the wrinkles out, and it's lightweight to hold. It's so easy, just add water to the container and it heats up quickly. I like that you can use it vertically or horizontally. This is the best steamer out there!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Just received the steamer and quickly tested it. This is an excellent steamer that's economical and well made. Comes with its own water cup as well as a large capacity tank as well as a brush. It quickly heats up and generates a lot of steam. A must have compared to the pricier options out in the market.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Quick and works
reviews.reviewText: It saves my time and I can quickly use it daily before my work and the results are good. I would use it at least 4 days a week. Nice product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Heats up fast and gets wrinkles out well! Handy and portable!
reviews.reviewText: This handy little steamer is the perfect thing to get wrinkles out of your clothes fast! The new version heats up more quickly and is so helpful when you want to touch up a spot or two but don't have a lot of time. It produces and shoots out steam well, and it has a long cord that makes longer reaches possible. It's got a sleek design and its size allows it to be portable, so it's perfect to take with you when going on trips and your clothes get wrinkled in a suitcase. I highly recommend this to anyone who wants a quick and easy alternative to getting out pesky wrinkles without having to pull out a whole setup for ironing clothes!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great to use.
reviews.reviewText: EASY TO CARRY,VALUE FOR MONEY,GETS THE TASK DONE IN MINUTES

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I like it because it takes almost no time at all to start up and begin using (within 30 seconds to 1 minute). I've never owned an iron or anything before now because I'm living in a very small space at the moment. I don't have the space for a full ironing board and I don't want to wait so long for it to warm up and be ready.I attached a before and after as I tried it out on one of my shirts. I did this one inside-out because it's a graphic tee and I wasn't sure if it would affect the quality of the image. No damage/harm to the shirt or graphic. Per the instructions, the steaming can be done on a garment while it's up on a hanger. I definitely have the space to work with it on a hanger, but I was being a little lazy, so I did this on my bed. All wrinkles gone in the second pic! (The camera captures it weirdly, but those folds on the second pic are just natural folds of the shirt/lighting.) I can only imagine the results would be 100% perfect if I actually did it from a hanger and not on my bed, haha.It's nice and convenient.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great travel steamer
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I bought the first model of this travel steamer years ago (2019 i believe) and being a frequent traveler with a bigger family now, decided to try this newer (and improved?) version after having a positive experience with the first. Overall, i think they’re pretty similar with the main differences being size (this is slightly bigger) and heat up time (this is much faster).I like that the steamer is compact and convenient for keeping clothes wrinkle-free when traveling with limited space or on a budget.Easy set up allows for quick steaming and clean up. The ergonomic handle and generous power cord length (about 8 ft.) provides seamless movement and maneuverability which is great when you’re in a rush to get out the door.My only issue (and i experienced the same with the original model as well as my regular-sized standing steamers from other brands) is sometimes water will drip out when tilted too far down, leaving clothes or carpet slightly damp and occasional hand burns if you're not careful.All in all, it’s a great tool to have handy whether for travel or quick use at home and a good deal if looking for a reliable and budget-friendly steamer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars New and Improved
reviews.reviewText: The very first steamer I have ever bought was also through OGHom, so I was excited to try their new and improved product which is this handheld steamer that is supposed to be faster and larger. At first glance, I can definitely tell that this product is larger than my previous steamer which will allow me to steam more items without having to stop and refill.The package comes with the steamer, a measuring cup, and a fabric brush that is indicated to help you "brush" out the wrinkles as you are steaming. I decided to try the steamer out on my shower curtain that was wrinkled from use to see how it would fare since that is a large surface. Immediately I could tell that it could produce steam a lot faster than my previous one, within maybe 15 seconds there was already steam coming out. Steaming-wise, I think it did okay however I feel that the original OG Hom steamer that I had purchased still reigns supreme in terms of performance, even if I need to wait a little bit longer and I think would be more convenient for travel since its smaller.
